column4: Hi, I have a question. I need to rebuild apache2 because Virtualmin needs suexec builded with homedir=/home. I downloaded apache 2.2.4 and used "./configure --with-suexec-docroot=/home && make && make install". but the problem is, after I restart apache2, it's still the old version. What's wrong with my process?
use the --prefix option to ./configure and install into /opt
it's not working. what's interesting is that I've already removed apache2.
chown: changing ownership of `/var/lock/apache2': Operation not permitted
it's working now but still old version which is 2.0.55
You've got some new init scripts
